entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Intellisense bug: when contents of string interpolation contains newline, the final double quote is incorrectly moved #39846
    Backlog
  • Unreachable exception in `EEMethodSymbol.DeclaringSyntaxReferences` #65165
    17.5
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33104.203 #65240

Updated

  • Codegen of System.Nullable `is null` check is poor #65091
    17.5
  • C#: The compiler should be consistent about issuing error CS1612 when modifying readonly rvalue struct #45284
    C# 12.0
  • Missing CS8970 when applying attribute alias with unsupported type substitution #58836
    Backlog
  • Code cleanup on save while resolving merge conflicts #60818
    17.4
  • Attribute properties are not suggested for local methods #64905
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Re-enable navigate-to streaming with IAsyncEnumerable. #65244
    Area-IDE
  • Is pattern expression with in parameter avoid unnecesary temp in rewriter #65243
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Re-enable all streaming services. #65241
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65242
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Implement `EEMethodSymbol.DeclaringSyntaxReferences` #65207
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65239
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #65246
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
